Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.socket

Class RemoteView

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.network.socket.RemoteView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServerMethodRequestHandler, View, java.lang.Runnable, java.rmi.Remote
    public class RemoteView
extends java.lang.Object
implements View, ServerMethodRequestHandler, java.lang.Runnable
    Class that represents a RemoteView. It also acts as a socket endpoint, handling the requests/responses on the server side.
